TopicTitle: What's wrong with my Eve Online battleship?

Articles.Content:
Eve Online chats range from useless to hostile, so got no help there. What's wrong with my first attempt at a battleship fit? It gets pounded nearly to destruction in minutes on missions I breezed through easily while flying a Navy Drake. 

Should I make it faster to avoid more damage or slower and tougher?

I've never played Eve, but I feel like the main problem is looks. It looks like a spaceship. This may seem ideal, but if you make it look reduculous or blend into the enviroment, it will be much harder to kill. Also what is eve online and how do i play

Edited May 12, 2019 by Kernel Kraken
My new phone lacks autocorrect., behold my awful typing skils

On 5/12/2019 at 10:11 AM, Kernel Kraken said:

Also what is eve online and how do i play

Eve online is a massively multiplayer game(MMO), it is kinda hard to explain(at least for me, i only played for a bit) Scott Manley plays it  and has videos about it. It should be on steam, you can play free but it is severely limited.
